title: Ordinance prohibiting the sale of ephedrine

abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO. 154  INTRODUCED BY ALDERWOMAN JENNIFER FLORIDA   	An ordinance containing definitions; prohibiting the sale, delivery or distribution of ephedrine, pseudo ephedrine, their salts, their optical isomers or salts of their optical isomers;  requiring the reporting of theft of ephedrine products; containing a penalty clause, severability clause, and emergency clause.
